title: Book a Slot for the Blood Donation Camp
subtitle: Every drop counts. Let's make a difference together!
info_message: Pick a date and time slot for the blood donation camp
modal_message_error: All medical teams are allocated on this day. Please select another date.
modal_message_warning_part1: There are pending camps on this day.
modal_message_warning_part2: medical team(s) available. Allocation will be on a first-come basis.
